Title: Relates to one-day marriage officiants
Summary: Provides that an applicant for a one-day marriage officiant license must apply for such license in the same town or city clerk's office that issued the marriage license for the couple to be married.
LawCode: Amd ยง11-d, Dom Rel L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the domestic relations law, in relation to one-day marriage officiant licenses
